entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Android] Resolve issues with FlyoutPage recreating the details page whenever it's navigated to #22919
    9.0-preview7
  • CollectionView ScrollTo scrolls to wrong group index in Android #22915
  • Setting BackgroundColor to null does not actually changes BackgroundColor #22914
  • Radio Button and CollectionView together do not work correctly #22913
  • CollectionView Header and Footer leak memory on iOS #22910
  • [Proposal Open] Move all compatibility project code to a separate repository #22909
    9.0-preview7
  • Label or Place holder value is not given for edit fields present on New recipe page: A11y_.NET Core_RecipesAppHomeScreen_New Recipe_AI4MAC #22906
  • Programmatic name is not given for "Hemberger" button: A11y_.NET Core_RecipesAppHomeScreen_Home Screen_AI4MAC #22904
  • [TEST] Review all (UI) Tests and remove platform-specific runs where possible #22902
    Backlog
  • MAUI on Android - when using ListView & ViewCell rows can appear in wrong order or sometimes be blank #22901
    Backlog
  • XAML Hot Reload breaks Prism Region application when running with Rider Debugger #22900
  • Title not updated after OnAppearing for TabbedPage in NavigationPage #22899
    Backlog
  • Display Bug On iOS about BoxView that under initial InVisible Layout #22897
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • Display Bug On iOS about RadioButton in CollectionView #22896
    Backlog

Closed

  • [Android]: CollectionView header template is not rendered #14603
    .NET 8 SR6
  • FontFamily is not set on Editor Placeholder on iOS #20839
    Backlog
  • [BUG][iOS] Maui 8.0.10+ - CarouselView - Previous item content disappears after scrolling to next item #22015
    .NET 8 SR6
  • NamedFontSize ignores FontAutoScalingEnabled #22732
  • Home Indicator Auto Hidden Not Working In MAUI #16247
  • Missing "appxrecipe" Maui Won't Deploy #22842
  • RoundRectangle Border is messed up when contains an Image with AspectFill #19877
    Backlog
  • Android Border with RoundRectangle Stroke does not correctly round corners of things within it #21173
    .NET 8 SR7
  • [ios] ContentPage.ToolbarItems is not currently being Garbage Collected (clicked event handler used) #22814
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • Move Compatibility Project out to a separate nuget/workload #7548
    Under Consideration
  • MAUI Blazor project created earlier in .Net 7 is not launching now with VS 17.10.1 #22888
  • [Testing] Remove IgnoreIfPlatforms usage on UITests #22525
    .NET 8 SR7

PullRequests

Created

  • Fixes #22914 #22917
    community ✨
  • Attempt to fix crash in MauiApplication.OnCreate() #22911
    community ✨

Merged

  • Fix Android CollectionView Header and Footer Template #22889
  • iOS Entry & Editor Placeholder font follows FontFamily property #22864
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-entry, area-controls-editor
  • Use corrected index for CellDisplayingEnded #22912
  • [Android] Border with RoundRectangle - fix #21250
    community ✨, area-controls-border, .NET 8 SR7
  • Fix appium-install.ps1 #22916
  • [release/9.1xx-preview5] Update versions for preview5 #22908
  • Fix Appium install PowerShell script #22883
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
  • [ios/catalyst] fix memory leak in `ToolbarItem` #22893
    memory-leak 💦
  • [Testing] Remove IgnoreIfPlatforms usage on UITests #22526
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing
  • Remove LINQ and reflection from EasingTypeConverter #19260
    area-animation, t/housekeeping ♻︎, community ✨, stale

Updated

  • Picker Attribute "SelectedIndex" Not being respected on page load - fix #22353
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • WIP: HybridWebView control for integrating JS/HTML/CSS easily into a .NET MAUI app #22880
    do-not-merge, area-controls-hybridwebview, 9.0-preview6
  • `Size` and `SizeF` should not throw on `NaN` #22890
  • [WinUI] Fix DateTimeFormatter for "ddd" #20045
    area-controls-datetimepicker
  • Fix Action Sheets for macOS #19629
    platform/macOS 🍏, area-controls-dialogalert, stale
  • [iOS] Fix CarouselView loading previous item #22280
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview
  • Add possibility to run UI tests per category (or any filter) #22609
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, testing-infrastructure
  • Fix <ApplicationTitle> encoding in maui-mobile template #22084
    area-templates, community ✨, stale
  • [UI Testing] Add legacy tests (alternative) #22635
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, testing-legacy-ui-tests
  • Use DialogFragment for Android modals #22869
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-dialogalert
